entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
